Name: You Are Kaiju
About the game: Welcome to You are Kaiju. This game involves you the player rampaging through cities and causing chaos. Breath fire and fire plasma beams from your hands. Try to get the highest score through the levels. The mechanics in this game are as follows: The Player Can: Breath Fire, Fire Plasma beams from both hands, pickup cars and bash them against buildings. There are cars that drive around, citizens that will walk around, and tanks that will try to lower the players score.
